titleText: Apple, Microsoft, Uber and other tech giants are rising to the defense of Dreamers
mainText: Apple, Amazon, Facebook, Microsoft and Uber each are providing legal aid to employees affected by President Donald Trump’s decision to unwind a federal program that spares undocumented young adults from deportation. In addition,.

titleText: Windows 10: Microsoft promises to fix an ongoing game-stuttering problem
mainText: If your PC games have been plagued by starts, stops, and other 'stuttering' issues, you're not alone. Microsoft has identified 'several different problem sources' that can cause stutter within the current Windows 10 Creators Update,.

titleText: Microsoft releases Language Community app so you can help translate Windows

titleText: Microsoft Azure gets a new VM family for bursty workloads

titleText: Microsoft’s custom Chainsmokers Xbox One S is designed for your inner EDM bro
mainText: In the event that you happen to be in the market for an offensive piece of living room electronics, Microsoft has teamed up with DJ duo The Chainsmokers to design a one-of-a-kind Xbox One S.
